document.full_text: japanese nuclear power plant operator tokyo electric will hold a news conference on sunday on the outlook for the crisis at its quake-damaged plant in fukushima, 240 km (150 miles) northeast of tokyo, public broadcaster nhk reported.
document.title: tepco chief to meet media on nuclear crisis outlook: nhk
lines_and_colors: japanese nuclear power plant operator tokyo electric will hold a news conference on sunday on the outlook for the crisis at its quake-damaged plant in fukushima, 240 km (150 miles) northeast of tokyo, public broadcaster nhk reported.
